post.body: I feel your pain. Winter break and I have to work from home because buses are out. Not what I wanted.
Brandautopsy is good and has had a great Drucker review this week
Be careful, remember the bus video from yesterday.
Sorry that your trip is ruined; make sure you file/write them about it. Still have a Merry Christmas
I thought there were regulations against that after the Detroit/northwest incident a few yrs ago - AmericanAirlines-what gives?
You are joking at this point. They aren't providing drinks and food after 5 hrs on the tarmac?
Did u get the screen fixed? Saw someone twit that theirs was fixed and then (?) a warranty will cover it
Name the airline and see if anybody responds....PDX - help needed!
It brings back great memories; folding the pastries like paper footballs. Yum!
What did you bake? Care to share them?
Hey you just got back from WDW... And your mind is in the gutter? Keep that great humor going ;)
My hat's off to you lost the bedtime battles long ago and still regret it. Hang in there snuggle and tough love
be glad it's a short flight; i did cross country last night :( darn! lost on the over have fun in DEEtroit!
i'll take to over on that Detroit flight...maybe out of town by 8PM (with luck?)
they can just look at your profile and see recent posts; or look at "Everyone" and come across a few of your posts
Check out Toys and Tshirts at http://toys.alltop.com/ and http://tshirts.alltop.com/
Grocery store hit by locusts- delivery trucks haven't come; holiday dinner shopping & people buying in case of storm/loss of power :(
excuse serious fri afternoon - which is bigger threat to US democracy - ban bailout, auto "loan" or russia - http://is.gd/cBb7 ?
